data: The note "Pay Electricity Bill" has the title that indicates a task to settle the electricity invoice.
The note "Pay Electricity Bill" contains a reminder to complete the electricity bill payment before the 15th.
The note "Pay Electricity Bill" specifies that payment before the 15th is required to avoid late fees.
The note "Pay Electricity Bill" captures the key insight that timely payment prevents financial penalties.
The note "Pay Electricity Bill" summarizes a business process for managing monthly utility expenses.
